hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abu Musa said:"The Prophet (saas) heard me saying: 'La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah (there is no power and no strength except with Allah).' He said: 'O 'Abdullah bin Qais! Shall I not tell you of a word which is one of the treasures of Paradise?' I said: 'Yes, O Messenger of Allah.' He said: 'Say: La hawla wa la quwwata illa billah (There is no power and no strength except with Allah)

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي " لاَ حَوْلَ وَلاَ قُوَّةَ إِلاَّ بِاللَّهِ
chapter.eng-name: What Was Narrated Concerning "There Is No Power Nor Strength Except With Allah"
